headline: KLA’s Robust Q2 Results and Cash Returns Could Be A Game Changer For KLA (KLAC)
summary: KLA Corporation recently reported past second-quarter fiscal 2026 results showing higher revenue of US$3,297.15 million and net income of US$1,145.68 million year over year, alongside issuing guidance for third-quarter revenue of about US$3.35 billion and GAAP diluted EPS between US$8.07 and US$9.63. In parallel, KLA’s board affirmed a quarterly dividend of US$1.90 per share and the company completed a multi-year share repurchase totaling 18,859,237 shares for US$9.06 billion, underscoring...

headline: AMAT Climbs 8% in a Month: Time to Buy, Sell or Hold the Stock?
summary: Applied Materials shares jump 7.6% in a month as strength in wafer fab tools, advanced packaging and AI-driven demand supports its long-term growth case.

headline: Lam Research Stock's High P/E: Justified Premium or Too Pricey to Buy?
summary: LRCX trades at a 38.14 forward P/E after a 175% rally, but AI-driven demand, strong margins and $5B-plus quarters fuel confidence in its growth.
